mapper.select: SELECT pd.product_detail_no, pd.color_code, s.psize, s.amount FROM product_detail pd, stock s WHERE pd.product_detail_no = s.product_detail_no AND pd.product_no = #{value}
SELECT product_detail_no, psize, CASE WHEN amount > 0 THEN 'STOCKED' ELSE 'SOLD_OUT' END AS "is_stock" FROM stock WHERE product_detail_no = #{value}
mapper.update: UPDATE stock SET amount = amount - #{amount} where product_detail_no = #{productDetailNo} and psize = #{psize} and amount>=#{amount}
